en.code:
const message = context.item.data.lastMessage || 'No messages yet';
return message.length > 40 ? message.substring(0, 40) + '...' : message;

const message = context.item.data.lastMessage || 'No messages yet';
return message.length > 40 ? message.substring(0, 40) + '...' : message;

const name = variables['selectedGuest']?.name || 'Guest';
return name.split(' ').map(part => part[0]).join('').substring(0, 2).toUpperCase();

text.en: Hi there! I'm interested in renting a car for my trip next week. Do you have any Tesla Model 3 available?

_ww-text_text.en: Hi there! I'm interested in renting a car for my trip next week. Do you have any Tesla Model 3 available?

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideInLeft { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

text.en: Hello! Yes, we have Tesla Model 3 available for your dates. The daily rate is $120. Would you like me to reserve one for you?

_ww-text_text.en: Hello! Yes, we have Tesla Model 3 available for your dates. The daily rate is $120. Would you like me to reserve one for you?

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

text.en: That sounds great! Yes, please reserve it for me. What time can I pick up the car?

_ww-text_text.en: That sounds great! Yes, please reserve it for me. What time can I pick up the car?

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideInLeft { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

text.en: Perfect! I've reserved a Tesla Model 3 for you. You can pick it up anytime between 9 AM and 6 PM. Please bring your driver's license and credit card for the deposit. Is there anything else you need?

_ww-text_text.en: Perfect! I've reserved a Tesla Model 3 for you. You can pick it up anytime between 9 AM and 6 PM. Please bring your driver's license and credit card for the deposit. Is there anything else you need?

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }
